00059   ssize_t et_socket_read(int fd, void *vptr, size_t n, int *errnop, bool *eofp) {
00060     size_t nleft;
00061     ssize_t nread;
00062     char *ptr;
00063 
00064     ptr = (char *)vptr;
00065     nleft = n;
00066     while (nleft > 0) {
00067       if ((nread = ::read(fd, ptr, nleft)) < 0) {
00068         if (errno == EINTR) {
00069           nread = 0; /* and call read() again */
00070           continue;
00071         }
00072         *errnop = errno;
00073         if (nleft < n)
00074           break;
00075         return -1;
00076       }
00077       else if (nread == 0) {
00078         *eofp = true;
00079         break;
00080       }
00081 
00082       nleft -= nread;
00083       ptr   += nread;
00084     }
00085     return n - nleft;
00086   }
00087 
00088   ssize_t et_socket_writev(int fd, const struct iovec *vector, int count, int *errnop) {
00089     ssize_t nwritten;
00090     while ((nwritten = ::writev(fd, vector, count)) <= 0) {
00091       if (errno == EINTR) {
00092         nwritten = 0; /* and call write() again */
00093         continue;
00094       }
00095       *errnop = errno;
00096       return -1;
00097     }
00098     return nwritten;
00099   }
00100

00104 bool IOHandlerData::handle_event(struct epoll_event *event) {
00105   int error = 0;
00106   bool eof = false;
00107 
00108   //DisplayEvent(event);
00109 
00110   if (event->events & EPOLLOUT) {
00111     if (handle_write_readiness()) {
00112       m_reactor_ptr->cancel_requests(this);
00113       deliver_event(new Event(Event::DISCONNECT, m_id, m_addr, Error::OK));
00114       return true;
00115     }
00116   }
00117 
00118   if (event->events & EPOLLIN) {
00119     size_t nread;
00120     while (true) {
00121       if (!m_got_header) {
00122         uint8_t *ptr = ((uint8_t *)&m_message_header) + (sizeof(Header::Common) - m_message_header_remaining);
00123         nread = et_socket_read(m_sd, ptr, m_message_header_remaining, &error, &eof);
00124         if (nread == (size_t)-1) {
00125           if (error == EAGAIN)
00126             break;
00127           if (errno != ECONNREFUSED) {
00128             HT_ERRORF("FileUtils::read(%d, len=%d) failure : %s", m_sd, m_message_header_remaining, strerror(errno));
00129           }
00130           m_reactor_ptr->cancel_requests(this);
00131           error = (errno == ECONNREFUSED) ? Error::COMM_CONNECT_ERROR : Error::OK;
00132           //HT_ERRORF("read returned -1 : %s", strerror(errno));
00133           deliver_event(new Event(Event::DISCONNECT, m_id, m_addr, error));
00134           return true;
00135         }
00136         else if (nread < m_message_header_remaining) {
00137           m_message_header_remaining -= nread;
00138           if (error == EAGAIN)
00139             break;
00140           error = 0;
00141         }
00142         else {
00143           m_got_header = true;
00144           m_message_header_remaining = 0;
00145           m_message = new uint8_t [m_message_header.total_len];
00146           memcpy(m_message, &m_message_header, sizeof(Header::Common));
00147           m_message_ptr = m_message + sizeof(Header::Common);
00148           m_message_remaining = (m_message_header.total_len) - sizeof(Header::Common);
00149         }
00150         if (eof)
00151           break;
00152       }
00153       if (m_got_header) {
00154         nread = et_socket_read(m_sd, m_message_ptr, m_message_remaining, &error, &eof);
00155         if (nread < 0) {
00156           if (error == EAGAIN)
00157             break;
00158           HT_ERRORF("FileUtils::read(%d, len=%d) failure : %s", m_sd, m_message_header_remaining, strerror(errno));
00159           m_reactor_ptr->cancel_requests(this);
00160           deliver_event(new Event(Event::DISCONNECT, m_id, m_addr, Error::OK));
00161           return true;
00162         }
00163         else if (nread < m_message_remaining) {
00164           m_message_ptr += nread;
00165           m_message_remaining -= nread;
00166           if (error == EAGAIN)
00167             break;
00168           error = 0;
00169         }
00170         else {
00171           DispatchHandler *dh = 0;
00172           uint32_t id = ((Header::Common *)m_message)->id;
00173           if ((((Header::Common *)m_message)->flags & Header::FLAGS_BIT_REQUEST) == 0 &&
00174               (id == 0 || (dh = m_reactor_ptr->remove_request(id)) == 0)) {
00175             if ((((Header::Common *)m_message)->flags & Header::FLAGS_BIT_IGNORE_RESPONSE) == 0) {
00176               HT_WARNF("Received response for non-pending event (id=%d,version=%d,total_len=%d)",
00177                           id, ((Header::Common *)m_message)->version, ((Header::Common *)m_message)->total_len);
00178             }
00179             delete [] m_message;
00180           }
00181           else
00182             deliver_event(new Event(Event::MESSAGE, m_id, m_addr, Error::OK, (Header::Common *)m_message), dh);
00183           reset_incoming_message_state();
00184         }
00185         if (eof)
00186           break;
00187       }
00188     }
00189   }
00190 
00191 #if defined(HT_EPOLLET)
00192   if (event->events & POLLRDHUP) {
00193     HT_DEBUGF("Received POLLRDHUP on descriptor %d (%s:%d)", m_sd, inet_ntoa(m_addr.sin_addr), ntohs(m_addr.sin_port));
00194     m_reactor_ptr->cancel_requests(this);
00195     deliver_event(new Event(Event::DISCONNECT, m_id, m_addr, Error::OK));
00196     return true;
00197   }
00198 #else
00199   if (eof) {
00200     HT_DEBUGF("Received EOF on descriptor %d (%s:%d)", m_sd, inet_ntoa(m_addr.sin_addr), ntohs(m_addr.sin_port));
00201     m_reactor_ptr->cancel_requests(this);
00202     deliver_event(new Event(Event::DISCONNECT, m_id, m_addr, Error::OK));
00203     return true;
00204   }
00205 #endif
00206 
00207   if (event->events & EPOLLERR) {
00208     HT_ERRORF("Received EPOLLERR on descriptor %d (%s:%d)", m_sd, inet_ntoa(m_addr.sin_addr), ntohs(m_addr.sin_port));
00209     m_reactor_ptr->cancel_requests(this);
00210     deliver_event(new Event(Event::DISCONNECT, m_id, m_addr, Error::OK));
00211     return true;
00212   }
00213 
00214   if (event->events & EPOLLHUP) {
00215     HT_DEBUGF("Received EPOLLHUP on descriptor %d (%s:%d)", m_sd, inet_ntoa(m_addr.sin_addr), ntohs(m_addr.sin_port));
00216     m_reactor_ptr->cancel_requests(this);
00217     deliver_event(new Event(Event::DISCONNECT, m_id, m_addr, Error::OK));
00218     return true;
00219   }
00220 
00221   return false;
00222 }

00229 bool IOHandlerData::handle_event(struct kevent *event) {
00230 
00231   //DisplayEvent(event);
00232 
00233   assert(m_sd == (int)event->ident);
00234 
00235   if (event->flags & EV_EOF) {
00236     m_reactor_ptr->cancel_requests(this);
00237     if (!m_connected)
00238       deliver_event(new Event(Event::DISCONNECT, m_id, m_addr, Error::COMM_CONNECT_ERROR));
00239     else
00240       deliver_event(new Event(Event::DISCONNECT, m_id, m_addr, Error::OK));
00241     return true;
00242   }
00243 
00244   if (event->filter == EVFILT_WRITE) {
00245     if (handle_write_readiness()) {
00246       m_reactor_ptr->cancel_requests(this);
00247       deliver_event(new Event(Event::DISCONNECT, m_id, m_addr, Error::OK));
00248       return true;
00249     }
00250   }
00251 
00252   if (event->filter == EVFILT_READ) {
00253     size_t available = (size_t)event->data;
00254     size_t nread;
00255     while (available > 0) {
00256       if (!m_got_header) {
00257         uint8_t *ptr = ((uint8_t *)&m_message_header) + (sizeof(Header::Common) - m_message_header_remaining);
00258         if (m_message_header_remaining < available) {
00259           nread = FileUtils::read(m_sd, ptr, m_message_header_remaining);
00260           if (nread < 0) {
00261             HT_ERRORF("FileUtils::read(%d, len=%d) failure : %s", m_sd, m_message_header_remaining, strerror(errno));
00262             m_reactor_ptr->cancel_requests(this);
00263             deliver_event(new Event(Event::DISCONNECT, m_id, m_addr, Error::OK));
00264             return true;
00265           }
00266           assert(nread == m_message_header_remaining);
00267           m_got_header = true;
00268           available -= nread;
00269           m_message_header_remaining = 0;
00270           m_message = new uint8_t [m_message_header.total_len];
00271           memcpy(m_message, &m_message_header, sizeof(Header::Common));
00272           m_message_ptr = m_message + sizeof(Header::Common);
00273           m_message_remaining = (m_message_header.total_len) - sizeof(Header::Common);
00274         }
00275         else {
00276           nread = FileUtils::read(m_sd, ptr, available);
00277           if (nread < 0) {
00278             HT_ERRORF("FileUtils::read(%d, len=%d) failure : %s", m_sd, available, strerror(errno));
00279             m_reactor_ptr->cancel_requests(this);
00280             deliver_event(new Event(Event::DISCONNECT, m_id, m_addr, Error::OK));
00281             return true;
00282           }
00283           assert(nread == available);
00284           m_message_header_remaining -= nread;
00285           return false;
00286         }
00287       }
00288       if (m_got_header) {
00289         if (m_message_remaining <= available) {
00290           nread = FileUtils::read(m_sd, m_message_ptr, m_message_remaining);
00291           if (nread < 0) {
00292             HT_ERRORF("FileUtils::read(%d, len=%d) failure : %s", m_sd, m_message_remaining, strerror(errno));
00293             m_reactor_ptr->cancel_requests(this);
00294             deliver_event(new Event(Event::DISCONNECT, m_id, m_addr, Error::OK));
00295             return true;
00296           }
00297           assert(nread == m_message_remaining);
00298           available -= nread;
00299 
00300           DispatchHandler *dh = 0;
00301           uint32_t id = ((Header::Common *)m_message)->id;
00302           if ((((Header::Common *)m_message)->flags & Header::FLAGS_BIT_REQUEST) == 0 &&
00303               (id == 0 || (dh = m_reactor_ptr->remove_request(id)) == 0)) {
00304             if ((((Header::Common *)m_message)->flags & Header::FLAGS_BIT_IGNORE_RESPONSE) == 0) {
00305               HT_WARNF("Received response for non-pending event (id=%d)", id);
00306             }
00307             delete [] m_message;
00308           }
00309           else
00310             deliver_event(new Event(Event::MESSAGE, m_id, m_addr, Error::OK, (Header::Common *)m_message), dh);
00311           reset_incoming_message_state();
00312         }
00313         else {
00314           nread = FileUtils::read(m_sd, m_message_ptr, available);
00315           if (nread < 0) {
00316             HT_ERRORF("FileUtils::read(%d, len=%d) failure : %s", m_sd, available, strerror(errno));
00317             m_reactor_ptr->cancel_requests(this);
00318             deliver_event(new Event(Event::DISCONNECT, m_id, m_addr, Error::OK));
00319             return true;
00320           }
00321           assert(nread == available);
00322           m_message_ptr += nread;
00323           m_message_remaining -= nread;
00324           available = 0;
00325         }
00326       }
00327     }
00328   }
00329 
00330   return false;
00331 }

00333   ImplementMe;

00336 
00337 bool IOHandlerData::handle_write_readiness() {
00338 
00339   if (m_connected == false) {
00340     socklen_t name_len = sizeof(m_local_addr);
00341     int sockerr = 0;
00342     socklen_t sockerr_len = sizeof(sockerr);
00343 
00344     if (getsockopt(m_sd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_ERROR, &sockerr, &sockerr_len) < 0) {
00345       HT_ERRORF("getsockopt(SO_ERROR) failed - %s", strerror(errno));
00346     }
00347 
00348     if (sockerr) {
00349       HT_ERRORF("connect() completion error - %s", strerror(sockerr));
00350       return true;
00351     }
00352 
00353     int bufsize = 4*32768;
00354     if (setsockopt(m_sd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_SNDBUF, (char *)&bufsize, sizeof(bufsize)) < 0) {
00355       HT_ERRORF("setsockopt(SO_SNDBUF) failed - %s", strerror(errno));
00356     }
00357     if (setsockopt(m_sd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_RCVBUF, (char *)&bufsize, sizeof(bufsize)) < 0) {
00358       HT_ERRORF("setsockopt(SO_RCVBUF) failed - %s", strerror(errno));
00359     }
00360 
00361     if (getsockname(m_sd, (struct sockaddr *)&m_local_addr, &name_len) < 0) {
00362       HT_ERRORF("getsockname(%d) failed - %s", m_sd, strerror(errno));
00363       return true;
00364     }
00365     //clog << "Connection established." << endl;
00366     m_connected = true;
00367     deliver_event(new Event(Event::CONNECTION_ESTABLISHED, m_id, m_addr, Error::OK));
00368   }
00369   else {
00370     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00371     if (flush_send_queue() != Error::OK)
00372       return true;
00373     if (m_send_queue.empty())
00374       remove_poll_interest(Reactor::WRITE_READY);
00375   }
00376   return false;
00377 }

00380 
00381 int IOHandlerData::send_message(CommBufPtr &cbp, time_t timeout, DispatchHandler *disp_handler) {
00382   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00383   int error;
00384   bool initially_empty = m_send_queue.empty() ? true : false;
00385   Header::Common *mheader = (Header::Common *)cbp->data.base;
00386 
00387   HT_LOG_ENTER;
00388 
00389   // If request, Add message ID to request cache
00390   if (mheader->id != 0 && disp_handler != 0 && mheader->flags & Header::FLAGS_BIT_REQUEST) {
00391     boost::xtime expire_time;
00392     boost::xtime_get(&expire_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00393     expire_time.sec += timeout;
00394     m_reactor_ptr->add_request(mheader->id, this, disp_handler, expire_time);
00395   }
00396 
00397   m_send_queue.push_back(cbp);
00398 
00399   if ((error = flush_send_queue()) != Error::OK)
00400     return error;
00401 
00402   if (initially_empty && !m_send_queue.empty()) {
00403     add_poll_interest(Reactor::WRITE_READY);
00404     //HT_INFO("Adding Write interest");
00405   }
00406   else if (!initially_empty && m_send_queue.empty()) {
00407     remove_poll_interest(Reactor::WRITE_READY);
00408     //HT_INFO("Removing Write interest");
00409   }
00410 
00411   return Error::OK;
00412 }

00416 #if defined(__linux__)
00417 
00418 int IOHandlerData::flush_send_queue() {
00419   ssize_t nwritten, towrite, remaining;
00420   struct iovec vec[2];
00421   int count;
00422   int error = 0;
00423 
00424   while (!m_send_queue.empty()) {
00425 
00426     CommBufPtr &cbp = m_send_queue.front();
00427 
00428     count = 0;
00429     towrite = 0;
00430     remaining = cbp->data.size - (cbp->data_ptr - cbp->data.base);
00431     if (remaining > 0) {
00432       vec[0].iov_base = (void *)cbp->data_ptr;
00433       vec[0].iov_len = remaining;
00434       towrite = remaining;
00435       ++count;
00436     }
00437     if (cbp->ext.base != 0) {
00438       remaining = cbp->ext.size - (cbp->ext_ptr - cbp->ext.base);
00439       if (remaining > 0) {
00440         vec[count].iov_base = (void *)cbp->ext_ptr;
00441         vec[count].iov_len = remaining;
00442         towrite += remaining;
00443         ++count;
00444       }
00445     }
00446 
00447     nwritten = et_socket_writev(m_sd, vec, count, &error);
00448     if (nwritten == (ssize_t)-1) {
00449       if (error == EAGAIN)
00450         return Error::OK;
00451       HT_WARNF("FileUtils::writev(%d, len=%d) failed : %s", m_sd, towrite, strerror(errno));
00452       return Error::COMM_BROKEN_CONNECTION;
00453     }
00454     else if (nwritten < towrite) {
00455       if (nwritten == 0) {
00456         if (error == EAGAIN)
00457           break;
00458         if (error) {
00459           HT_WARNF("FileUtils::writev(%d, len=%d) failed : %s", m_sd, towrite, strerror(error));
00460           return Error::COMM_BROKEN_CONNECTION;
00461         }
00462         continue;
00463       }
00464       remaining = cbp->data.size - (cbp->data_ptr - cbp->data.base);
00465       if (remaining > 0) {
00466         if (nwritten < remaining) {
00467           cbp->data_ptr += nwritten;
00468           if (error == EAGAIN)
00469             break;
00470           error = 0;
00471           continue;
00472         }
00473         else {
00474           nwritten -= remaining;
00475           cbp->data_ptr += remaining;
00476         }
00477       }
00478       if (cbp->ext.base != 0) {
00479         cbp->ext_ptr += nwritten;
00480         if (error == EAGAIN)
00481           break;
00482         error = 0;
00483         continue;
00484       }
00485     }
00486 
00487     // buffer written successfully, now remove from queue (which will destroy buffer)
00488     m_send_queue.pop_front();
00489   }
00490 
00491   return Error::OK;
00492 }
00493 
00494 #elif defined(__APPLE__)
00495 
00496 int IOHandlerData::flush_send_queue() {
00497   ssize_t nwritten, towrite, remaining;
00498   struct iovec vec[2];
00499   int count;
00500 
00501   while (!m_send_queue.empty()) {
00502 
00503     CommBufPtr &cbp = m_send_queue.front();
00504 
00505     count = 0;
00506     towrite = 0;
00507     remaining = cbp->data.size - (cbp->data_ptr - cbp->data.base);
00508     if (remaining > 0) {
00509       vec[0].iov_base = (void *)cbp->data_ptr;
00510       vec[0].iov_len = remaining;
00511       towrite = remaining;
00512       ++count;
00513     }
00514     if (cbp->ext.base != 0) {
00515       remaining = cbp->ext.size - (cbp->ext_ptr - cbp->ext.base);
00516       if (remaining > 0) {
00517         vec[count].iov_base = (void *)cbp->ext_ptr;
00518         vec[count].iov_len = remaining;
00519         towrite += remaining;
00520         ++count;
00521       }
00522     }
00523 
00524     nwritten = FileUtils::writev(m_sd, vec, count);
00525     if (nwritten == (ssize_t)-1) {
00526       HT_WARNF("FileUtils::writev(%d, len=%d) failed : %s", m_sd, towrite, strerror(errno));
00527       return Error::COMM_BROKEN_CONNECTION;
00528     }
00529     else if (nwritten < towrite) {
00530       if (nwritten == 0)
00531         break;
00532       remaining = cbp->data.size - (cbp->data_ptr - cbp->data.base);
00533       if (remaining > 0) {
00534         if (nwritten < remaining) {
00535           cbp->data_ptr += nwritten;
00536           break;
00537         }
00538         else {
00539           nwritten -= remaining;
00540           cbp->data_ptr += remaining;
00541         }
00542       }
00543       if (cbp->ext.base != 0) {
00544         cbp->ext_ptr += nwritten;
00545         break;
00546       }
00547     }
00548 
00549     // buffer written successfully, now remove from queue (which will destroy buffer)
00550     m_send_queue.pop_front();
00551   }
00552 
00553   return Error::OK;
00554 }
